sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Pagination, PaginationItem, PaginationLink } from 'reactstrap';

const Day = (props) => {
    const [dropdownOpen, setDropdownOpen] = useState(false);
  const [selected , setSelected] = useState('Daily');

  useEffect(()=>{
    props.handleFilter(selected)
  }, [selected])

  return (
    <Pagination aria-label="Select Day of the Week">
    <PaginationItem>
        <PaginationLink first href="#" />
      </PaginationItem>
      <PaginationItem>
        <PaginationLink previous href="#" />
      </PaginationItem>
      <PaginationItem>
        <PaginationLink onClick={()=>setSelected('Monday')}>
          Mon
        </PaginationLink>
      </PaginationItem>
      <PaginationItem>
        <PaginationLink onClick={()=>setSelected('Tuesday')}>
          Tue
        </PaginationLink>
      </PaginationItem>
      <PaginationItem>
        <PaginationLink onClick={()=>setSelected('Wednesday')}>
          Wed
        </PaginationLink>
      </PaginationItem>
      <PaginationItem>
        <PaginationLink onClick={()=>setSelected('Thursday')}>
          Thur
        </PaginationLink>
      </PaginationItem>
      <PaginationItem>
        <PaginationLink onClick={()=>setSelected('Friday')}>
          Fri
        </PaginationLink>
        <PaginationLink onClick={()=>setSelected('Saturday')}>
          Sat
        </PaginationLink>
        <PaginationLink onClick={()=>setSelected('Sunday')}>
          Sun
        </PaginationLink>
      </PaginationItem>
      <PaginationItem>
        <PaginationLink next href="#" />
      </PaginationItem>
      <PaginationItem>
        <PaginationLink last href="#" />
      </PaginationItem>
    </Pagination>
  );
}

export default Day;
